column1: Local Foods////The chips were a nice shade of orange
column2: however they were too salty for my taste. It had the perfect crunch to it
column3: but if they reduced the salt and added more pepper maybe it would have been a killer! The kale I tried next
column7: and supposedly cheese (I didn't really feel/taste the cheese) It was bleh too me
column8: but that maybe because I've actually never had kale. This didn't ruin it for me though my genius self somehow ended up using the kale as a chip dip. It was a perfect balance
column9: the kale helped reduce the salty taste
column10: while the chips added flavor and the crunch lacking in the kale.
